reviews.review: portal

This was indeed a great game.  There is nothing to complain about.  I will never stop playing this and the original Portal.  It is sad that Valve saw no way to produce another chapter in this great game.  I only hope that others get to enjoy it as much as I have and still do.
Ок
Прохожу игру уже в 5 раз и каждый раз пытаюсь пройти камеры как то по новому или как спидранер
No, please! I don't wan't to race anymore!
Неплохое продолжение легендарной игры!

In some ways I got a bit bored with how long it was - so many puzzles! But honestly it's hardly a criticism. Portal 1 was far too short and had to be packaged with other games. This one is way longer and actually feels like a full, polished game, and there are SO many puzzles.

But the real factor in my recommendation comes from Stephen Merchant, who made me chuckle from start to finish. Inspired choice for voice actor.
classic
Головоломки классные, сюжет супер. 12 ГЛАДос из 10

i did enjoy this ten year old puzzle game but now it's old and sadly it will get old on you but it still makes the mind work very hard but it will get very old the more you'd do it it had a good run but now it's over for it i'v found better games to take Portal 2's place even the 1st ones place since there both old and Portal 1 is harder then Portal 2 and normally it's the other way around normally first ones easier then the second one but with Portal it's the 1st ones harder then the 2nd one now first i was stuck on a level on the second one but got through it so it did get easy after that then got old sadly...  It's not getting deleted just doing it once in a blue moon that's it since it gets old so i'll do it once in a blue moon and with me that is either i'll do it once in awhile or i'm all done with Portal 2 first it does start out fun but then it will get even older then it did before.... and more into Farming Simulators and City Sweeper clean it fast then with Portal 2 since Portal also has had it's days and those have ended more i'd do it more its fun would drain out of it well now it has no more fun even though it's a strategy puzzle game it had fun love Wheatley it was sad when he turned then the end when GLADOS got very very very mean then suddenly got all nice and sweet and she was like just go get out of aperture basically.....  And she's the type of AI that's first all nice and sweet then acts like those AIs on those old shows where the AI took over the world and killed everyone so actually her being all nice and sweet is fake since those AIs could get very mean and vicious and kill everyone and take over the world like in the old shows

Very good game. It makes you think logically while also having the adrenaline rush of other games.  Valve deserves more credit for this game

10/10

Valve does it even better in Portal 2. 

The game expands by making characters even more comedic while adding even more puzzle complexities. Just like the previous game, you wont find game breaking bugs and glitches and will be pleased to see a more hashed out story. To top it off, they did everyone the courtesy of adding a lengthy and fun co-op, as well as community servers. 

Just get the game already.

The portal mechanics are good, not perfect, good. There are some issues here and there, but you most likely wont notice them, as they are texture or lighting issues. Speaking of lighting, HAS THIS BEEN PORTED TO SOURCE 2 OR WHAT? Holy crap the lighting is good, especially for 2011! Honestly I wouldn't be surprised if Valve has slowly updated the singleplayer campaign's lighting. Speaking of which. The story is great. The subltety, (sorry if I misspelled that), is perfect! The multiplayer is only as good as the players. As in, the campaign great! The multiplayer aspect? Ehhhh, depends on who your playing with. Anyways, (sorry for typing an essay lmao), games great. Buy it, play it, hell even play the community levels.

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here; "Huge success"
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction
Aperture Science:
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead
But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake
You just keep on trying
Till you run out of cake
And the science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are
Still alive
I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart,
And killed me
And tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you
Now, these points of data
Make a beautiful line
And we're out of beta
We're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD I got burned
Think of all the things we learned-
For the people who are
Still alive
Go ahead and leave me
I think I'd prefer to stay inside
Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you?
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke *Haha - Fat Chance*
Anyway this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist
Look at me: still talking
When there's science to do
When I look out there,
It makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are
Still alive
And believe me I am
Still alive
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive
Still alive

how you basically try to figure out how to solve
each puzzle...

Games is amazing with it's graphics updated and some
new content and some new challanges, and ofc Multiplayer
- COOP, that is...

This game brings memories, i got it on the day it was released,
and i didn't regret it...

Definetly worth of money...

这款游戏太赞了，玩法还不错，难度不大，
特别是里面的废弃工厂那一章，宏大而昏暗的场景真的特别有代入感，能够完全融入进场景中
特别提醒：晕3D的朋友慎入，反正玩完之后就再也不会晕了。疗效绝对够猛！！！
